text: Bergisch Gladbach (; Ripuarian: Jläbbisch Gläbbich) is a city in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia. It is near to Cologne and has about 110,016 inhabitants. == Well-known people == * Heidi Klum (b. 1973), model, actress and singer ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Rheinisch-Bergische Rural District
title: Bergisch Gladbach
